name: NewJerseyTraffic
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new jersey traffic
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The free New Jersey Traffic Skill allow motorists and commuters alike, to hear about real-time traffic conditions on New Jersey's state and interstate roadways, toll roads, as well as, the region's bridges and tunnels.

Information can be requested by a City or by Roadway. 

In addition, users can request travel times for interstates, toll roads or select bridges and tunnels.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
